snippet: The leaders of Indonesia and Australia said Wednesday the two countries' sometimes stormy ties were on the mend following their first meeting since a damaging row last year over spying allegations and people smuggling....

headline.print_headline: Indonesia, Australia Leaders Hold Make-Up Talks
headline.main: Indonesia, Australia Leaders Hold Make-Up Talks

lead_paragraph: The leaders of Indonesia and Australia said Wednesday the two countries' sometimes stormy ties were on the mend following their first meeting since a damaging row last year over spying allegations and people smuggling.
